meanings.definition: Japan: a country in East Asia
meanings.sent1: I want to visit Japans next year.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of traveling to Japans.
meanings.sent3: My friend loves learning about Japans' culture.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of Japans is captivating.
meanings.sent5: The cherry blossoms in Japans are famous worldwide.

meanings.definition: Japan: a type of varnish or lacquer used on metal or wood surfaces
meanings.sent1: The carpenter applied Japans to the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: The antique cabinet was restored with Japans.
meanings.sent3: The shiny Japans on the furniture caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The Japans on the sculpture gave it a luxurious look.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully brushed on the Japans for a glossy finish.

meanings.definition: Japan: to coat with a glossy black lacquer
meanings.sent1: She decided to japans the old chair to give it a new look.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman japansed the entire cabinet beautifully.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally japansed my hands while painting the furniture.
meanings.sent4: He japansed the frame of the mirror to match the room decor.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of japansing has been passed down for generations.
